    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleProcedureModule

        public SimpleProcedureModule(java.lang.String name,
                             ModuleHashTable<Module> subModules,
                             LoggerModule logger,
                             ModuleHashTable<OwnableModule> requiredModules,
                             boolean forceOwnership,
                             long millisDelay)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new ProcedureModule with given arguments.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of this Module.
        subModules - The submodules of this Module.
        requiredModules - OwnableModule-s that must be acquired by this procedure.
        forceOwnership - Whether or not to force OwnableModule acquisition on Procedure start.
        millisDelay - The standard delay in between internal calls. Use 50 as a default...
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null.

    • Method Detail

      • shutDown

        public void shutDown()
        Interrupts this, should get called if overridden. Super docs: Shuts down the module if it is not already shut down. Should generally be called after procedures have finished executing.
        Specified by:
        shutDown in interface Module

      • start

        public void start()
        Description copied from interface: ProcedureModule
        Starts the procedure if it was not already running. If procedure is newly starting, shouldn't return until the Procedure has entered the RUNNING state.
        Specified by:
        start in interface ProcedureModule

      • interrupt

        public void interrupt()
        Description copied from interface: ProcedureModule
        Interrupts the procedure prematurely if it is currently running. If procedure is newly stopping, shouldn't return until the Procedure has entered the INTERRUPTED state.
        Specified by:
        interrupt in interface ProcedureModule

      • setLogger

        public void setLogger(LoggerModule logger)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: Module
        Sets the Logger of this module.
        Specified by:
        setLogger in interface Module
        Overrides:
        setLogger in class SimpleModule
        Parameters:
        logger - The logger that the module should now use.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the inputs == null.

      • getState

        public ProcedureModule.ProcedureState getState()
        Description copied from interface: ProcedureModule
        Returns the current state of this Procedure.
        Specified by:
        getState in interface ProcedureModule
        Returns:
        A ProcedureState representing the current state of this ProcedureModule.
        See Also:
        ProcedureModule.ProcedureState

      • ownsAllRequired

        protected boolean ownsAllRequired()
        Sees if this Procedure's Thread owns all of it's required OwnableModules. Does not check if Procedure has stopped for any reason.
        Returns:
        true if it does, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        OwnableModule.isOwnedBy(Thread)

      • noneOwnsAllRequired

        protected boolean noneOwnsAllRequired()
        Sees if this nothing owns any of this' required OwnableModules. Does not check if Procedure has stopped for any reason.
        Returns:
        true if nothing does, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        OwnableModule.isNotOwned()

      • acquireAllRequired

        public boolean acquireAllRequired(boolean force)
        Attempts to acquire ownership for all of this' required OwnableModules. Does not check if Procedure has stopped for any reason.
        Parameters:
        force - Whether to force acquisition.
        Returns:
        the result of this.ownsAllRequired() after attempting all acquisitions.
        See Also:
        OwnableModule.acquireOwnershipFor(Thread, boolean)

      • relinquishAllRequired

        public void relinquishAllRequired()
        Attempts to relinquish ownership for all of this' required OwnableModules if this ProcedureModule has a Thread.

      • procedureStart

        protected abstract void procedureStart()
        First method called after the Procedure starts and attempts to aquire ownership of required OwnableModules.

      • procedureUpdate

        protected abstract void procedureUpdate()
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Called repetitively from within the Procedure after starting while the thread has access to requirements, it hasn't finished, and it hasn't been interrupted.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any unhandled error occurs when updating.

      • procedureUpdatesComplete

        protected abstract boolean procedureUpdatesComplete()
        Determines if procedureUpdate() should stop being called.
        Returns:
        A boolean representing whether updates have completed normally.

      • procedureOwnershipLost

        protected abstract void procedureOwnershipLost()
        Called if this Procedure no longer owns all of it's required OwnableModules (or they weren't owned and now are) while it was trying to update. If ownership is regained, the Procedure will continue updating, otherwise it will stop and go into the ProcedureModule.ProcedureState.ERRORED state.

      • procedureInterrupted

        protected abstract void procedureInterrupted()
        Called if this Procedure was .interrupt()ed after .procedureUpdate() has completed execution but before .procedureClean() is called.

      • procedureClean

        protected abstract void procedureClean()
        Last method called before the Procedure relinquishes ownership of required OwnableModules and terminates.
